wpPost.title: How to integrate SecurePay with Magento 2
wpPost.content:
Are you currently trying to decide on a payment provider for your Magento stores? Your main concerns are the security and smooth integration of payment methods for your e-commerce websites. If you’re thinking about using SecurePay, a well-known payment gateway from Australia, we have all the information you need. In this blog, we’ll give you a detailed guide on integrating SecurePay with Magento 2 stores. Our aim is to help you make informed choices and improve your checkout process using this popular payment method.

How to Integrate SecurePay with Magento 2: A Step-by-Step Guide

What do you know about SecurePay?

SecurePay, an Australian-based payment solutions provider, offers a comprehensive range of e-commerce payment options tailored to businesses of all sizes. With the highly reputable and widely utilized SecurePay method, organizations can effortlessly establish their online presence in as little as five business days.

As a trailblazer in Australia’s online payments industry, SecurePay boasts extensive experience in assisting local enterprises. With a remarkable 15-year track record, SecurePay has successfully empowered over 40,000 online businesses, particularly those categorized as small and medium-sized, to seamlessly integrate their e-commerce operations.

In addition, if you are seeking to integrate Magento 2 with SecurePay, our expertise, and resources will enable you to effortlessly connect these platforms and optimize your online payment processes.

Why SecurePay is worthy to invest?

SecurePay offers an extensive range of payment options, including Visa, MasterCard, American Express, Diners Club International, and PayPal, providing online shoppers with more flexibility. This wide selection helps organizations boost their conversion rates by allowing customers to swiftly place online orders. The best part is that SecurePay streamlines the application process, eliminating the need for in-person bank visits.

If you play in an online casino, then you definitely donâ€™t have to worry about going to the bank. Playing on the Slotogate platform using the deposit method instadebit casino canada. Just like the withdrawal will be credited directly to your card

From a business standpoint, SecurePay is highly regarded for its seamless integration with major internet shopping carts. Clients also enjoy convenient access to reputable Australian banks, ensuring smooth payment management. SecurePay prioritizes security, safeguarding online payments against fraud and unauthorized access.

With SecurePay, users can easily access their card information and access detailed transaction reports, enabling effective transaction management. Store owners can leverage this data to devise successful marketing strategies and enhance overall payment account management.

If you’re looking to Magento 2 integrate with SecurePay, our solution provides a reliable and efficient connection between the two platforms, facilitating seamless payment processing and improving the overall shopping experience for your customers.

How to integrate SecurePay with Magento 2 checkout page?

To begin with, we will provide instructions for setting up an account with SecurePay:

1. Follow this link to access the registration page.

2. Click on the “Sign Up” button.

3. Enter the necessary information as outlined below:

Once you have completed the registration process, you will receive a confirmation email from SecurePay. Please check your email and click on the “Activate Now” button in the latest message from SecurePay.

On the SecurePay account page, you will find your Merchant ID, Publishable Key, and Private Key, which will be required for the Configuration process (which we will guide you through shortly.

To obtain your Merchant Account ID and Transaction Password for Paypal Settings, follow these steps:

  • Click on “Manage” and then select “Paypal Settings.”

For public testing purposes, SecurePay provides access to a sandbox environment with the following details:

  1.  Test Merchant Login URL: https://test.login.securepay.com.au/v3/
  2.  Merchant ID: ABC
  3.  Username: test
  4.  Password: abc1234 !!
  • Additionally, the following integration details can be used for testing purposes:
  1.  Merchant ID: ABC0001
  2.  Test Transaction Password: abc123
  • Outstanding functions of the Magento 2 SecurePay module

Payment via XML API message

If you require a dependable method for securely transmitting transaction details to SecurePay for processing, the SecurePay XML API is the perfect solution. This module ensures that each transaction is enclosed in a separate XML message, which is then sent to SecurePay for processing. Integrating the XML API into your website or application is a straightforward process that can be implemented on any platform using any programming language.

To process a transaction, an HTTPS URL is utilized to send the XML message to SecurePay using the POST method. Once the transaction is finalized, a response message is sent back to your server using the POST method as well. Typically, the processing of a message takes only a few seconds.

Payment directly on the storeâ€™s site

The Direct Post feature enables the secure transmission of customer transaction information directly to SecurePay. This is accomplished by displaying a form on your website where customers can enter their card details.

This integration ensures a seamless user experience, similar to the familiar Magento Default interface, providing customers with an intuitive checkout process. Unlike an API, which directly transmits data from the customer’s computer to SecurePay for processing, Direct Post redirects customers back to your site’s checkout page to finalize their orders after the transaction is completed.

Payment via Paypal gateway

Secure Pay Paypal is a transaction gateway that leverages Paypal for payment processing, while Secure Pay acts as a secure storage facility for customer data.

This integration ensures a smooth payment experience for customers who opt for Paypal as their preferred payment method. It offers a hassle-free and convenient payment option seamlessly integrated with Secure Pay’s robust data storage system.

Accept all commonly-used payment cards

One of the standout features of Secure Pay is its ability to accept a wide variety of popular global debit and credit cards, including:

  •  Visa
  •  Mastercard
  •  American Express
  •  Discover
  •  Diners Club
  •  JCB
  •  Bankcard

The wide range of accepted cards caters to the needs of both store owners and customers, ensuring seamless and convenient payment processing. Studies have revealed that customers’ inclination towards specific card options has a substantial impact on conversion rates. By offering customers the ability to pay with their preferred cards, businesses can greatly enhance sales and conversion rates.

Ensure high security for payment

Secure Pay guarantees robust security measures for payment processing. To protect customer data, all merchants accepting credit and debit card payments must adhere to the Payment Card Industry Data Security Standard (PCI DSS). By installing the Secure Pay module, your website automatically meets these compliance requirements.

In addition, the Secure Pay extension holds certification for ISO27001, a globally acknowledged information security management standard. This means you can confidently expand your business and foster customer trust, knowing that compliance concerns are well-handled.

Conclusion

In conclusion, Secure Pay is a robust and reliable payment gateway that provides secure, convenient, and seamless payment processing for businesses and customers alike, including How the Checkout Process is Organized in Magento 2. Secure Pay offers a wide array of payment options, encompassing popular credit and debit cards, as well as seamless integration with Paypal for added convenience. It prioritizes top-level security for payment processing, complying with the PCI DSS standard, and holding the prestigious ISO27001 certification. With its intuitive interface and straightforward integration, Secure Pay is an excellent choice for businesses aiming to streamline their payment processes and enhance customer experience, including those seeking guidance on how to integrate SecurePay with Magento 2 for their checkout process.
